commit message:
Merge pull request #46 from sklart/patch-2

Update master
Rename lib to libs to be in line with current Android project structure defaults
Bump min SDK version to 7 (2.1), specify target SDK
Display 'Next Article' action in action bar instead of floating button for API level 11 and higher
Prevent DictionariesActivity destruction on orientation change which causes crash during data integrity check
Enable system zoom controls (pinch to zoom) for API level 11 and higher
Enabled action bar 'home' button for API level 11 and higher
Use onScaleChanged instead of deprecated getScale()
Disable pinch to zoom for now - it doesn't call onScaleChange and sometimes doesn't properly reflow text/repaint view

Improve partial refresh to do a full refresh every 4
page turns (source code from Cool Reader)
Support new Nook EPD controller, patch by klush via coolreader
Append http schema to server url if missing
